DOC.brief_summary: Primary objective : To determine oral bioavailability liquid formulation intend pediatric use potential food effect healthy adult . Secondary objective : To evaluate safety tolerability measure physical examination finding , vital sign , electrocardiogram ( ECG ) , laboratory parameter , adverse event ( AEs ) .
